effect: When this unit is performing a melee attack, before rolling attack dice:
Target this unit. This attack rolls +2 attack dice and may reroll any dice. After completing this attack, it becomes Vulnerable.
Order: Stark Fury.trigger: When this unit is performing a melee attack, before rolling attack dice

effect: When a friendly battlefield unit in long range activates:
Target that friendly unit. Until the end of the turn, it may reroll any charge distance dice and ignores all terrain penalties.
Order: Scout Terrain.trigger: When a friendly battlefield unit in long range activates

effect: Start of a friendly turn:
Target 1 enemy battlefield unit in long range and LoS. It becomes Vulnerable and, until the end of the turn, cannot be the target of enemy orders or tactics cards.
When this unit activates:
Target any number of enemies this unit is engaging. Those enemies suffer 2 hits, plus 1 additional hit for each remaining rank in this unit.
When this unit is attacked, after rolling defense dice:
Target this unit. If it is being attacked from the front or flank, it may reroll any defense dice.
Order: Bulwark Formation.trigger: When this unit is attacked, after rolling defense dice

effect: After an enemy completes a melee attack on this unit:
Target that enemy. It suffers 1 wound, plus 1 additional wound for each of this unit's destroyed ranks.
Order: Lash Out.trigger: After an enemy completes a melee attack on this unit

effect: After an enemy completes a melee attack on this unit:
Target this unit. It performs 1 retreat action. It gains +1 to morale dice results for this action.
Order: Wolf's Cunning.trigger: After an enemy completes a melee attack on this unit

effect: When this unit destroys an enemy:
Instead of surging forth, this unit may perform 1 charge or march action.
Order: Overrun.trigger: When this unit destroys an enemy

effect: When this unit performs a morale test, after rolling dice:
All rolls for this test become successes. After this test has been completed, this unit suffers 1 wound.
Order: Set an Example.trigger: When this unit performs a morale test, after rolling dice

effect: When this unit successfully charges an enemy, target that enemy. It becomes Vulnerable.
This unit's melee attacks gain Vicious (+2), with an additional (+1) for each of this unit's destroyed ranks.
When an enemy battlefield unit is performing an attack on this unit, after rolling defense dice, this unit blocks +1 hit. If it has any destroyed ranks, it blocks +1 additional hit.
This unit's melee attacks gain Vicious (+2), with an additional (+1) if this unit has a destroyed rank.
• When this unit successfully charges an enemy, target that enemy. It becomes Vulnerable or Panicked.
• Each model in this unit has 2 wounds.
• Once during this unit's activation, before selecting its action, it may perform 1 maneuver action.
When this unit performs a morale test, if it is engaged and has an equal or greater number of remaining ranks than each enemy it is engaging, it may reroll any dice.
After an enemy completes a melee attack on this unit, target that enemy. If it does not have more remaining ranks than this unit, it suffers a panic test (4).
When this unit is successfully charged in the front or flank, if it was not already engaged, it may perform 1 melee attack on the charging unit before that unit performs its attack.

When an enemy declares a charge action against this unit from the front, before resolving that action, this unit may perform 1 ranged attack action against that enemy. This unit cannot shift as part of this attack.
After an enemy engaged with this unit suffers wounds from a panic test, target this unit. It restores 1 wound for each wound that enemy suffered from that test.
This unit's melee attacks gain +1 to hit and Critical Blow.
• Charge Bonus: Target the defender. It becomes Panicked and Vulnerable.
• This unit's melee attacks roll +2 dice.
• After rolling attack dice, for each final die result of 1, this unit suffers 1 wound.
After rolling charge distance dice, this unit may reroll any dice.
This unit's melee attacks gain Vicious (2). If it already had Vicious, it gains Vicious (+1).
When an enemy engaged with this unit suffers wounds from a panic test, you may target that enemy. It becomes Weakened.

Once per round, if Catelyn is on the council board and an enemy unit declares an attack action, before resolving that attack, you may target the defender. Until this action has been completed, it cannot be targeted by enemy abilities or tactics cards.
**Influence:** While influencing a friendly battlefield unit, that unit attacks using its highest attack die value.
Once per game, when Sansa claims a council zone, you may replace that zone's effect with the effect of any zone controlled by an opponent.

**Claim (Any Zone):** You may replace this zone's effect with: If your opponent controls the Crown zone, you may resolve this without discarding any cards. Otherwise, discard 2 tactic cards from your hand. If you do, return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.
**(Any Zone) Influence:** While Influencing a friendly battlefield unit, after rolling melee attack dice, that unit may reroll any attack dice.
**Claim:** Treat Escalation on this zone as 1 higher.
**(Any Zone) Influence:** Influenced friendly units ignore the Dangerous, Hindering, and Rough keywords. Influenced enemy units treat the entire battlefield as having the Rough keyword.
Each time Joffrey claims a zone, you may target 1 enemy battlefield unit. It becomes Panicked.
**Influence:** While influencing a friendly battlefield unit, their melee attacks gain Vicious (+2).

Once per round, when a friendly battlefield unit is performing a melee attack and Qyburn is on the council board, before rolling attack dice, you may have that attack gain Critical Blow and Sundering. If you do, after completing that attack, the attacker becomes Vulnerable.
**Influence:** While influencing a friendly battlefield unit, their melee attacks gain +1 to hit. After rolling attack dice, for each final die result of 1, this unit suffers 1 wound.
Each time you draw tactics cards, you may draw 1 additional card, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into your deck.
**Claim:** You may replace this zone's effect with: Look at your opponent's hand of tactics cards. Select and discard 1 of those cards.
**Influence (Any Zone):** While influencing an enemy battlefield unit, each time that unit suffers a panic test (x), that test gains (+1).
**Influence:** While influencing an enemy battlefield unit, 1 enemy attachment in that unit loses all abilities.
• Vicious (3)
• Charge Bonus: Target the defender. It becomes Panicked.
• If the defender suffers wounds from Vicious, you may target 1 other enemy in long range of that enemy. It suffers a panic test (3), with (+1) for each of the defender's destroyed ranks.
• Sundering
• Vicious (2)
• Charge Bonus: Target the defender. It becomes Panicked.
• When the defender performs a panic test caused by this attack's Vicious, that test gains (+1) for each of the defender's destroyed ranks.
• Sundering
• Before rolling attack dice, if this unit began the turn engaged, this attack rolls +1 attack die for each of this unit's remaining ranks beyond the first.
• Critical Blow
• Ignores units and terrain when determining LoS.
• Critical Blow
• If this unit has a destroyed rank, this attack gains +1 to hit.
• Sundering
• Charge Bonus: Target the defender. It becomes Vulnerable.
• Sundering
• Critical Blow
• Sundering
• This unit has 4 wounds.
• This unit can only suffer a maximum of 1 wound from failing panic tests.
• Once during this unit's activation, it may perform 1 retreat or maneuver action.
